title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!: Mr. Rebokku no Ciao Ciao Interview
original_name: 家庭教師ヒットマン REBORN! ミスターリボックのちゃおちゃおインタビュ
sinopse:
KHR: Mr. Rebokku no Ciao Ciao Interview is set of 3 DVD specials in which, Reborn, dressed as host interviews various characters selected by a wheel.

Episode #1
Features Reborn as Host, and Tsunayoshi, Gokudera and Xanxus as guests.

Episode #2
Features Reborn as Host, and Hibari, Belphegor and Dino as guests.

Episode #3
Features Reborn as Host, and, differently than before, four characters which are Byakuran, Mukuro, Squalo and Yamamoto.

[Written by Katekyo Hitman Reborn! FC]
